q1_general_response: {"answer": "Based on the image alone, several overlapping conditions to consider include: a benign melanocytic nevus (mole), atypical nevus (dysplastic nevus), or potentially early melanoma. "}
q2_dataset_response: {"answer": "The image shows a skin lesion with the following visual details: a brown-pigmented, somewhat circular or oval-shaped macule or patch with irregular borders and uneven color distribution. The lesion appears to be slightly raised or textured. There are several hairs present within the lesion, which can make it difficult to assess its surface and borders clearly. "}
